scripts.build: yarn build:git && yarn build:clean && yarn build:typescript && yarn build:static
scripts.build:static: cpx "src/**/*.{yml,json}" dist && cpx "tests/**/*.{yml,json}" dist && cpx "git.properties" dist 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "yarn tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --watch" "nodemon -r dotenv/config -q --inspect dist/index.js"
scripts.sam:local: yarn sam:build && sam local start-api --region us-west-1 --profile claudia
scripts.sam:deploy: yarn sam:build && sam deploy --region us-west-1 --config-env prod --parameter-overrides "EnvironmentType=prod VisualCrossingApiKey=$VC_API_KEY CacheTTLHours=3 AllowedOrigins=https://weather.weekendwanderings.com S3CacheBucket=gadzooks-sam-artifacts" --no-confirm-changeset --profile claudia --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.sam:deploy:qa: yarn sam:build && sam deploy --region us-west-1 --config-env qa --parameter-overrides "EnvironmentType=qa VisualCrossingApiKey=$VC_API_KEY CacheTTLHours=12 AllowedOrigins=https://qa-weather-react.onrender.com S3CacheBucket=gadzooks-sam-artifacts" --no-confirm-changeset --profile claudia --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.sam:deploy:dev: yarn sam:build && sam deploy --region us-west-1 --config-env dev --parameter-overrides "EnvironmentType=dev VisualCrossingApiKey=$VC_API_KEY CacheTTLHours=24 AllowedOrigins=https://beta-weather-react.onrender.com,https://dev-weather-react.onrender.com,http://localhost:3000,http://localhost:3001,http://localhost:3002,http://localhost:5173,http://localhost:5174 S3CacheBucket=gadzooks-sam-artifacts" --no-confirm-changeset --profile claudia --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
